content: come and get your dream buy a crafter's let's make that pie cart really easy to
do okay so I got these wood blocks at the craft store and there are two thirds
of an inch square okay I glue those together now let those dry next I got
these craft sticks that are kind of pointy on the end you can find these at
the craft store I cut an inch off and I would use those for a detail on the cart
and you'll see a little later what I do with that and then I made the wheels out
of wooden buttons I used rhinestones for the center of the
wheel to hide the two little holes in the button okay and I glued that on with
goop because white glues not so great on plastic to wood but if you use the goop
it'll get a nice secure bond for them so then I started putting on those pieces I
cut off earlier the 1-inch pieces on the side of the cart even a nice little
detail kind of a gothic II detail I think and then I added some more wood
pieces between those those little pointed pieces on the bottom I turned it
over and added two axles with just matchsticks so I just cut those added
glue those to the bottom with white glue then I glued the wheels on now be
careful at this stage because it's easy to get these wheels out of alignment and
one wheel can be higher than the other and it kind of throws the whole balance
of the card off so take your time with this make sure you get those aligned
okay now for the push part of the card I used a bamboo stick one of those Forks
those bamboo Forks right I cut the ends of the fork off put them
on the other end and then glued it so it's a open like that so it's a V so it
looks like you can push the cart right the next thing I want to do is put some
doors on the cart where the PI's can be stored so I put a cut these I got these
wooden pieces from the craft store you can get you can cut these from craft
sticks or anything they have all different kinds of shapes at the craft
store I have a bunch of different wooden shapes it's already had these squares so
I use these as the doors on the top of the car and I just white glue those on
then I white glued the handle for the cart and I put another door below that
so I thought it'd be fun to add a few more details one is I want to add a
little bell to this thing so I did I took a cocktail Fork a plastic cocktail
talked to health work and slowly bent it to get that nice bend in it don't you
know be gentle kind of work it and you'll get that kind of nice Bend then I
glued just a jewelry I had like a jewelry setting that I just glued to the
end with the goop and that will hold that nicely let that dry up then I got
these small teeny little beads and I put it all together so I put the bail on the
end of the car then the beads on the doors of the car to make them look like
you know handles that you can open the doors to the card so I hope you like
this and let's up tables ooh looks like here we have Morganza pushing the pie
cart down the pastry cart down the road and let's take a look here let's take a
closer look oh here comes Roderick no no project don't buy a pie don't do it and
McGrath is like yes Roderick buy a pie
okay let's check her out so here's a little peasant woman I had I liked that
she has a pan I think that's fun so just an old lady in her guise Morganza and
her guys of the old woman and let's simply take a look at the cart so here
it is all pained up I didn't show painting it up
I basically painted it dark brown and then added some grays and tans to it to
make it give this worn look I really think those details came out nice the
bells really fun and I think it has a gothic look with the spikes and I have a
door here where she could put children and I actually had the players see her
put a child in there and they ended up saving the child by buying the child off
for so that was fun and I hope you enjoyed this vid
